lang.word_default: Click OK to cancel this mail
The time that the most number of members were online
The member ID of the mail recipient
The member name of the mail recipient
The join date of the mail recipient
You may use the following 'quick tags' in your mail and they will be converted when the mail is sent.
Send to members who joined n days ago
Send to members whose last visit was n days ago
Manual HTML format? (Remember to use <br> tags. The auto HTML email wrapper will not be applied)
The number of posts for the mail recipient
Honor the 'Send me any updates sent by the community administrator' setting? This will only mail members who have opted in.
Could not find the bulk mail record you requested. Please try again.

Clicking the 'Start Sending The Mail' button below will activate the task manager's send bulk mail function which will send the mail in batches until the all the mail has been sent. You can watch the progress from the main Bulk Mail screen and cancel the mail from being sent.
We strongly recommend that you opt to send 20 mails per cycle as a maximum. Any more per cycle could severly affect performance of your server while the mail is being sent out.

As the mail is sent out in cycles of n  per minute, it can take a while to process all the mail.
Sending the bulk mail to %s members
Your criteria didn't match any members. Please adjust your current criteria, ensuring all correct fields are selected or entered.
You must select at least one group to send this mail message to. Please try again.
You must enter a mail subject and mail content before submitting. Please try again.
There was no ID passed to the mailer. Please try again.

Please be aware that bulk emails are sent by a task in IP.Board in the System Scheduler. They are not sent immediately upon saving or resending a bulk email. You can manually run this task in the System Scheduler if you wish to force emails to send immediately, otherwise they will be sent based on activity on your forums. Also, please be aware that any users who elect not to receive emails from the administrator in their user control panel will not receive bulk mails.
Cannot send - the mail doesn't have a subject and content. Please try again.

------------------------------------- Handy Links ------------------------------------- Community Address: {board_url} Log In: {board_url}?app=core&module=global&section=login Lost Password Recovery: {board_url}?app=core&module=global&section=lostpass
------------------------------------- How to unsubscribe ------------------------------------- Visit your email preferences ({board_url}?app=core&module=usercp) and ensure that the box for 'Send me any updates sent by the community administrator' is unchecked and submit the form

Please verify before continuing. There is no undoing this action! You will be merging all content (such as topics and personal conversations) currently belonging to %s into the account %s. The %s account will then be permanantly deleted.

This tool allows you to merge two member accounts into one. All of the member data will be retained from the account '%s'. All other data belonging to the account you select below (for example, topics and personal conversations) will then belong to %s and the selected account will be removed.

(Must be a unique word for this group)
Used when searching for members based on their value of this field
If 'yes', the field will be checked against the URL whitelist/blacklist filtering. Be careful to only enable this option on fields that you expect URLs to be submitted in.
If 'yes', the field will be shown upon registration.
Field MUST be completed and not left empty?
If 'yes', an error will be shown if this field is not completed.
Field can be edited by the member?
If 'no', the member cannot edit the field but Super Moderators and Admins will be able to.
Make this a private profile field?
If yes, field only visible to profile owner, super moderators and admins. If 'no', members can search within this field.
Make Admin and Super Moderator Editable/Viewable Only?
If yes, will override the above options so only admins and super moderators can see and edit this field. If enabled, the field will not show on the registration form!

Leave blank if you do not wish to add this field in the author details when viewing a topic.
{title} is the title of the custom field, {content} is the user added content. {key} is the form select value of the selected item in a dropdown box.
Example: <span class='row_title'>{title}:</span><span class='row_data'>{content}</span>
Example: <span class='row_title'>{title}:</span><span class='row_data'><img src='imgs/{key}'></span>

Use: a for alpha characters.
Use: n for numerics.
If you enter one 'a', that will allow one letter. Entering 'aa' will allow two letters, and so on.
Example, for credit card numbers: nnnn-nnnn-nnnn-nnnn
Example, Date of Birth: nn-nn-nnnn
Leave blank to accept any input
Option Content (for drop downs, checkboxes and radio buttons)

In sets, one set per line
Example for 'Gender' field:
m=Male
f=Female
u=Not Telling
Will produce:

m,f or u stored in database. When showing field in profile, will use value from pair (f=Female, shows 'Female')
For text input and text areas (in characters)

Max Characters: 250
Can be used to note hidden/required status
This is a key that can be used to identify the field (e.g. in skins)
